entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Escoumins
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning this morning. Local blowing snow late this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then west 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then clearing. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
